vernac_cmds: Lemma col_permutation_1 : forall A B C,Col A B C -> Col B C A.
Lemma col_permutation_2 : forall A B C, Col A B C -> Col C A B.
Lemma col_permutation_3 : forall A B C, Col A B C -> Col C B A.
Lemma col_permutation_4 : forall A B C, Col A B C -> Col B A C.
Lemma col_permutation_5 : forall A B C, Col A B C -> Col A C B.
Hint Resolve bet_col col_permutation_1 col_permutation_2 col_permutation_3 col_permutation_4 col_permutation_5 : col.
Lemma not_col_permutation_1 : forall (A B C : Tpoint), ~ Col A B C -> ~ Col B C A.
Lemma not_col_permutation_2 : forall (A B C : Tpoint), ~ Col A B C -> ~ Col C A B.
Lemma not_col_permutation_3 : forall (A B C : Tpoint), ~ Col A B C -> ~ Col C B A.
Lemma not_col_permutation_4 : forall (A B C : Tpoint), ~ Col A B C -> ~ Col B A C.
Lemma not_col_permutation_5 : forall (A B C : Tpoint), ~ Col A B C -> ~ Col A C B.
Hint Resolve not_col_permutation_1 not_col_permutation_2 not_col_permutation_3 not_col_permutation_4 not_col_permutation_5 : col.
Lemma Col_cases : forall A B C, Col A B C \/ Col A C B \/ Col B A C \/ Col B C A \/ Col C A B \/ Col C B A -> Col A B C.
Lemma Col_perm : forall A B C, Col A B C -> Col A B C /\ Col A C B /\ Col B A C /\ Col B C A /\ Col C A B /\ Col C B A.
Lemma col_trivial_1 : forall A B, Col A A B.
Lemma col_trivial_2 : forall A B, Col A B B.
Lemma col_trivial_3 : forall A B, Col A B A.
Hint Immediate col_trivial_1 col_trivial_2 col_trivial_3: col.
Lemma l4_13 : forall A B C A' B' C', Col A B C -> Cong_3 A B C A' B' C' -> Col A' B' C'.
decompose [or] H; eauto 6 using l4_6 with cong3.
Lemma l4_14 : forall A B C A' B', Col A B C -> Cong A B A' B' -> exists C', Cong_3 A B C A' B' C'.
prolong A' B' C' B C.
assert (Cong A C A' C') by (eapply l2_11;eCong).
assert (exists C', Bet A' C' B' /\ Cong_3 A C B A' C' B') by (eapply l4_5;Between).
prolong B' A' C' A C.
assert (Cong B C B' C') by (eapply l2_11;eBetween;Cong).
Lemma l4_16 : forall A B C D A' B' C' D', FSC A B C D A' B' C' D' -> A<>B -> Cong C D C' D'.
assert (Bet A' B' C') by (eapply l4_6;eauto).
assert(OFSC A B C D A' B' C' D') by (unfold OFSC;repeat split; assumption).
assert(Bet B' C' A') by (apply (l4_6 B C A B' C' A'); Cong;auto with cong3).
apply (l4_2 B C A D B' C' A' D').
unfold IFSC; unfold Cong_3 in *; spliter; repeat split;Between;Cong.
assert (Bet C' A' B') by (eapply (l4_6 C A B C' A' B'); auto with cong3).
eapply (five_segment_with_def B A C D B' A'); unfold OFSC; unfold Cong_3 in *; spliter; repeat split; Between; Cong.
Lemma l4_17 : forall A B C P Q, A<>B -> Col A B C -> Cong A P A Q -> Cong B P B Q -> Cong C P C Q.
assert (FSC A B C P A B C Q) by (unfold FSC; unfold Cong_3;repeat split; Cong).
Lemma l4_18 : forall A B C C', A<>B -> Col A B C -> Cong A C A C' -> Cong B C B C' -> C=C'.
Lemma l4_19 : forall A B C C', Bet A C B -> Cong A C A C' -> Cong B C B C' -> C=C'.
Lemma not_col_distincts : forall A B C , ~ Col A B C -> ~ Col A B C /\ A <> B /\ B <> C /\ A <> C.
repeat split;(auto;intro); subst; apply H; Col.
Lemma NCol_cases : forall A B C, ~ Col A B C \/ ~ Col A C B \/ ~ Col B A C \/ ~ Col B C A \/ ~ Col C A B \/ ~ Col C B A -> ~ Col A B C.
Lemma NCol_perm : forall A B C, ~ Col A B C -> ~ Col A B C /\ ~ Col A C B /\ ~ Col B A C /\ ~ Col B C A /\ ~ Col C A B /\ ~ Col C B A.
Lemma col_cong_3_cong_3_eq : forall A B C A' B' C1 C2, A <>B -> Col A B C -> Cong_3 A B C A' B' C1 -> Cong_3 A B C A' B' C2 -> C1 = C2.
intros A B C A' B' C1 C2 HAB HCol HCong1 HCong2.
apply l4_18 with A' B'; try apply l4_13 with A B C; Col; unfold Cong_3 in *; spliter.
apply cong_transitivity with A C; Cong.
apply cong_transitivity with B C; Cong.

command: decompose [or] H; eauto 6 using l4_6 with cong3.
prolong A' B' C' B C.
assert (Cong A C A' C') by (eapply l2_11;eCong).
assert (exists C', Bet A' C' B' /\ Cong_3 A C B A' C' B') by (eapply l4_5;Between).
prolong B' A' C' A C.
assert (Cong B C B' C') by (eapply l2_11;eBetween;Cong).
assert (Bet A' B' C') by (eapply l4_6;eauto).
assert(OFSC A B C D A' B' C' D') by (unfold OFSC;repeat split; assumption).
assert(Bet B' C' A') by (apply (l4_6 B C A B' C' A'); Cong;auto with cong3).
apply (l4_2 B C A D B' C' A' D').
unfold IFSC; unfold Cong_3 in *; spliter; repeat split;Between;Cong.
assert (Bet C' A' B') by (eapply (l4_6 C A B C' A' B'); auto with cong3).
eapply (five_segment_with_def B A C D B' A'); unfold OFSC; unfold Cong_3 in *; spliter; repeat split; Between; Cong.
assert (FSC A B C P A B C Q) by (unfold FSC; unfold Cong_3;repeat split; Cong).
repeat split;(auto;intro); subst; apply H; Col.
intros A B C A' B' C1 C2 HAB HCol HCong1 HCong2.
apply l4_18 with A' B'; try apply l4_13 with A B C; Col; unfold Cong_3 in *; spliter.
apply cong_transitivity with A C; Cong.
apply cong_transitivity with B C; Cong.
